scenario_text.value: Hey guys! I found Shuuji!
Aaaaaaaaaurgh!
Eyooow! You scared me!
Whoa, what the heck?!
What’s wrong, Shuuji?

Wha, what do you mean?! You guys don’t see
that?!
...I don’t see anything.

Look, right there! How can you guys act
so calm?!
There’s nothing there...right?
Yes, nothing, but...

What’s the deal? Is something wrong with the
guy?
He’s freaking me out...

Hey Kaito, I think he’s at the end of his
tether...
Yeah...
Hey, Takuma.
Yeah? Why are you speaking so softly?
Dracumon said that Shuuji might have lost it.
...I have to agree.
You shouldn’t talk about him like that...

(Clearly things can’t go on like this.
We have to do something...)
Shuuji...
Enough! I can’t stay here any longer!
What the—what’s wrong?!
Goodness gracious! Calm yourself, Shuuji!
You stay here, Miu.
Hey! Don’t treat me like a kid!
Let’s do what Kaito says for now, Miu.
...Wouldn’t it be best to leave him alone?

You’re right... But what was that about?
There’s...nothing, right?
Yeah. What the heck...

*huff* *huff*
I, I can’t hear it anymore.

I can’t see or hear it anymore...
What the heck was that?!

Another vision?! Now that I think about it,
I’ve heard that voice before...

Oh! Archnemon! No doubt about it, that was
Archnemon’s voice!

Now that I know, I’m...I’m okay.
I won’t let that vision destroy me!

Or maybe...maybe I’m seeing a vision right
now? Oh man, which is it...?

Things can’t go on like this!
My dad would be so disappointed in me!

As the leader, I have to make sure no one
gets sacrificed... If I do, I...

I can live up to my dad’s expectations!
This experience...is all for me!

Ha, ha ha ha... With this story, any college
entry interview will be a breeze!

I can get into as good a university as my big
brother! Dad will have to praise me then!

Yeah, that’s why I can’t go down here!
I won’t lose to a vision like that!

But I...they said I’m useless...
No, I’m fine...I...
Shuuji?! What’s wrong?!

Yeah...not to visions...
I won’t... I’ll never...
Uwaaaaaaugh!
Whoa! He freaking ran off again!

Where the heck’s he going?
He’s looking a little shaky on his feet...

Shuuji! Please come back!
Shuuji!!!

...Looks like he didn’t hear us.
What should we do?

We can’t just leave him like that.
Let’s go after him!
